name: Chicken Pot Pie
author: Becky Collier
instructions: Pressure or cook chicken until done (to make broth). Cook potatoes & carrots in broth until done. Add 1 can each of corn & green beans & chicken. Thicken with corn starch. Add pie crust to line a casserole dish. Add mixture to top of crust. Cover with a second crust. Bake
